Hollow Knight

Please remember to check necessary global requirements (e.g. recording for a legend run).

  • Read the Home page.

Champion Requirements

  • Steel Soul 112%

Legend Criteria

  • All Bosses Radiant
  • P5 no bindings

Master Criteria

  • P5 all bindings
  • Any% No Hit (No Major Glitches)
  • All Bosses Radiant Nail Only
